sectionHero.title: Earn a political science or global studies degree online

sectionGlobalCitizen.title: Become a global citizen
sectionGlobalCitizen.text: Arizona State University’s School of Politics and Global Studies offers degree programs designed to develop global citizens. Delivered through ASU Online, courses focus on how leaders use policy and research to solve the world’s most pressing problems in security and more. Learn how you can gain a global perspective and accomplish your goals from anywhere in the world.

cards.title: Leader in innovation
cards.text: ASU has been named #1 in innovation for 9 consecutive years by U.S. News & World Report. Find out what makes ASU Online unique.

cards.title: A global top-choice university
cards.text: ASU was named a top 10 university in the U.S. chosen by international students, according to the Institute of International Education, 2022.

sectionAccredited.title: Are ASU Online programs accredited?
sectionAccredited.text: Arizona State University is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission (HLC) to deliver all online degree programs through ASU Online. For more information on accreditation, please visit the University Program Review and Accreditation Office.
sectionAccredited.subText: Note: Students living and/or working outside of the U.S. must confirm with the relevant certifying agency if completing an online degree program at ASU meets the credentialing requirements of the country in which they seek employment.

sectionExplorePrograms.title: Explore political science and global studies degree programs
sectionExplorePrograms.text: The School of Politics and Global Studies offers seven online degree programs, including three undergraduate and four graduate degrees. Learn more about each option below.
